solution_line_template: There were {james_count} + {friends_count} = <<{james_count}+{friends_count}={total_volunteers}>>{total_volunteers} of them who volunteered to plant flowers.

Each day, the {total_volunteers} of them planted a total of {total_flowers_planted}/{number_of_days} = <<{total_flowers_planted}/{number_of_days}={flowers_per_day_total}>>{flowers_per_day_total} flowers.
Thus, James planted {flowers_per_day_total}/{total_volunteers} = <<{flowers_per_day_total}/{total_volunteers}={james_flowers_per_day}>>{james_flowers_per_day} flowers in a day.
